entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
